name: subscription billing recurring api
short_description:
The subscription billing recurring api works with many major API to provide integration futures. The API works based on the open integration platform, that can be integrated with any recurring billing subscriber management system http://www.experiencesure.com/solutions/subscription-billing-recurring-solution/. 

The targeted subscription billing platform has to provide their api to integrate with this open integration api. This api is useful for subscription management solutions in SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, Cloud, Pay TV, Media and entertainment, Utility billing, IoT, Broadband billing, and many more billing systems. To start using this api, you need to activate some functions in your dashboard area.

Also you need to define pricing, billing frequency and few more parameters, to see it working fine. To test the api, get your keys and perform a test for your needs. Your B2C needs may vary from vertical to vertical, but this system will work just fine, in all cases.
summary: The end to end subscription billing open integration api
